source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
    dd.[PKDateID] AS FKDateID,
    div.PKDivisionID AS FKDivisionID,
    dealer.PKDealerID AS FKDealerID,
    dp.PKProductID AS FKProductID,
    ds.PKShipperID AS FKShipperID,
    tvs.Quantity,
    tvs.UnitPrice,
    tvs.Discount
FROM 
    [stg].[StagingTVS] AS tvs
INNER JOIN
    DW.DimDate AS dd ON tvs.OrderDate = dd.[Date]
INNER JOIN
    DW.DimDivision AS div ON tvs.DivisionID = div.DivisionID
INNER JOIN
    DW.DimDealer AS dealer ON tvs.DealerID = dealer.DealerID
INNER JOIN
    DW.DimProduct AS dp ON tvs.ProductID = dp.ProductID
INNER JOIN
    DW.DimShipper AS ds ON tvs.ShipperID = ds.ShipperID;
